name: Craig ELLIS a/k/a Raheem Amir, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Ellis v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Craig ELLIS a/k/a Raheem Amir, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of May, 2015, the Notice of Appeal is hereby QUASHED as untimely.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Alan Matthew Robinson, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Jason Anthony Lambrino, Pennsylvania Office of Chief Counsel, Harrisburg, for Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
114 A.3d 1035
Craig ELLIS a/k/a Raheem Amir, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 18, 2015.
Raheem Amir, pro se.
Alan Matthew Robinson, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Jason Anthony Lambrino, Pennsylvania Office of Chief Counsel, Harrisburg, for Board of Probation and Parole.
